title: Canvas Paint Party
description: Kids get a pre-designed 8x10 canvas to paint, with step-by-step guidance from one of our art instructors. It’s a fun, creative experience where everyone leaves with their own unique masterpiece!

title: Expressive Paint Party
description: Kids get an 8x10 canvas with paints, brushes, and fun tools to explore textures and techniques. They’ll mix, layer, and create their own abstract masterpiece—no rules, just creativity! Perfect for creative, hands-on fun.

title: Mosaic Party
description: Kids choose a fun shaped board and pick their favorite border color before decorating it with colorful mosaic tiles! We’ll grout and paint each piece. A creative, hands-on experience everyone will love!
